title: The Island of Dr. Moreau - H.G.Wells (Unabridged)
description:
Audio Books : Sci-Fi : Other quality : English

Unabridged and read by Simon Prebble. 5 hours 20 mins duration. CD. (48 kbps / 44 kHz Mono Fraunhofer CBR MP3).



The classic 1896 chiller, in which Wells issues a resonant warning against scientific obsession and the Faustian pursuit of evolutionary control.
Adrift in a dinghy, Edward Prendick is rescued by a vessel carrying a menagerie of savage animals. Tended to recovery by their keeper Montgomery, Prendick soon finds himself stranded upon an uncharted island with his rescuer and the beasts.
